summary: When the closure of a railway is announced, employees commandeer a locomotive to get to corporate headquarters and confront the president.
cast: Kevin Bacon|Bob Balaban|Barbara Barrie|Michael Beach|Judy Benson|Carroll Dee Bland|Wilford Brimley|Clay Crosby|Dan DeMott|Trey Fancher|Henderson Forsythe|Armando Garza|Robert Ginnaven|Lillian Grimes|Levon Helm|Clint Howard|Holly Hunter|Rita Jenrette|Bruce McGill|Howard Morris|Missy Platt|Mary Steenburgen|Velva Walthall|Steve Wilkerson|Trey Wilson|Allison Choate|Jenny Fancher|B.J. Hardin|Don Hood|Keith James|Deborah Reece|Debra Stilwell|Sarah Vowell|John Williams
title: Final de trayecto
